languages.text: "Мое почтение, {name}..." {n}Кунрад смеривает вас взглядом, тонко улыбаясь.{/n} "Если точнее — {name} фон Валанциус, один из благословенного рода Вольных Торговцев на службе {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума Человечества{/g}. Вероятно, подобное родство оказалось для вас сюрпризом. Неудивительно — свидетельства этого были утрачены с поколениями, разделяющими вас и Лорд-капитана Теодору. Слуги Ее Светлости потратили немало сил, чтобы обнаружить и удостоверить эту кровную связь. Связь, делающую вас одн{mf|им|ой} из наследн{mf|иков|иц}".

traits.locale_text: "Мое почтение, {name}..." {n}Кунрад смеривает вас взглядом, тонко улыбаясь.{/n} "Если точнее — {name} фон Валанциус, один из благословенного рода Вольных Торговцев на службе Империума Человечества. Вероятно, подобное родство оказалось для вас сюрпризом. Неудивительно — свидетельства этого были утрачены с поколениями, разделяющими вас и Лорд-капитана Теодору. Слуги Ее Светлости потратили немало сил, чтобы обнаружить и удостоверить это кровную связь. Связь, делающую вас одн{mf|им|ой} из наследн{mf|иков|иц}".

languages.text: "My regards, {name}..." {n}Voigtvir looks you up and down with a thin smile.{/n} "Or should I say, {name} von Valancius, scion of a blessed Rogue Trader house in the service of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}? Perhaps this kinship came as a shock to you. Understandably so, given that all evidence of the connection was lost in the generations separating you and Lord Captain Theodora. It required no small effort on the part of Her Ladyship's servants to discover and verify this blood tie, which has now made you one of the heirs of this dynasty."
languages.original_text: "Мое почтение, {name}..." {n}Кунрад смеривает вас взглядом, тонко улыбаясь.{/n} "Если точнее — {name} фон Валанциус, один из благословенного рода Вольных Торговцев на службе {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума Человечества{/g}. Вероятно, подобное родство оказалось для вас сюрпризом. Неудивительно — свидетельства этого были утрачены с поколениями, разделяющими вас и Лорд-капитана Теодору. Слуги Ее Светлости потратили немало сил, чтобы обнаружить и удостоверить эту кровную связь. Связь, делающую вас одн{mf|им|ой} из наследн{mf|иков|иц}".

traits.locale_text: "My regards, {name}..." {n}Voigtvir looks you up and down with a thin smile.{/n} "Or should I say, {name} von Valancius, scion of a blessed Rogue Trader house in the service of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Perhaps this kinship came as a surprise to you. Unsurprising, given that most all evidence of it was lost in the generations separating you and Lord Captain Theodora. It required of Her Ladyship's servants no small effort to discover and verify this blood relation. The one that makes you one of the heirs."

"My regards, {name}..." {n}Voigtvir looks you up and down with a thin smile.{/n} "Or should I say, {name} von Valancius, scion of a blessed Rogue Trader house in the service of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Perhaps this kinship came as a surprise to you. Unsurprising, given that most all evidence of it was lost in the generations separating you and Lord Captain Theodora. It required of Her Ladyship's servants no small effort to discover and verify this blood relation. The one that makes you one of the heirs."

"My regards, {name}..." {n}Voigtvir looks you up and down with a thin smile.{/n} "Or should I say, {name} von Valancius, scion of a blessed Rogue Trader house in the service of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}? Perhaps this kinship came as a shock to you. Understandably so, given that all evidence of the connection was lost in the generations separating you and Lord Captain Theodora. It required no small effort on the part of Her Ladyship's servants to discover and verify this blood tie, which has now made you one of the heirs of this dynasty."

"My regards, {name}..." {n}Voigtvir looks you up and down with a thin smile.{/n} "Or should I say, {name} von Valancius, scion of a blessed Rogue Trader house in the service of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}? Perhaps this kinship came as a shock to you. Understandably so, given that all evidence of the connection was lost in the generations separating you and Lord Captain Theodora. It required no small effort on the part of Her Ladyship's servants to discover and verify this blood tie, which has now made you one of the heirs of this dynasty."

"My regards, {name}..." {n}Voigtvir looks you up and down with a thin smile.{/n} "Or should I say, {name} von Valancius, scion of a blessed Rogue Trader house in the service of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}? Perhaps this kinship came as a shock to you. Understandably so, given that all evidence of the connection was lost in the generations separating you and Lord Captain Theodora. It required no small effort on the part of Her Ladyship's servants to discover and verify this blood tie, which has now made you one of the heirs of this dynasty."

languages.text: “向您致意，{name}……”{n}维特威尔露出了微笑，从头到尾地打量着你。{/n}“或者，我应该称呼您为{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯，{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}行商浪人王朝的尊贵后裔？或许这样的亲缘关系让您震惊不已。这一点是可以理解的，毕竟，在您与西奥多拉领主舰长大人之间的几代人之间，所有能证明您血缘关系的证据都消失了。夫人的仆人们花了很大力气才找到了您，证实了您的血缘关系。如今，您已经是这个王朝的其中一位继承人了。”
languages.original_text: "My regards, {name}..." {n}Voigtvir looks you up and down with a thin smile.{/n} "Or should I say, {name} von Valancius, scion of a blessed Rogue Trader house in the service of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}? Perhaps this kinship came as a shock to you. Understandably so, given that all evidence of the connection was lost in the generations separating you and Lord Captain Theodora. It required no small effort on the part of Her Ladyship's servants to discover and verify this blood tie, which has now made you one of the heirs of this dynasty."

traits.locale_text: “向您致意，{name}……”{n}维特威尔露出了微笑，从头到尾地打量着你。{/n}“或者，我应该称呼您为{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯，{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}行商浪人王朝的尊贵后裔？或许这样的亲缘关系让您震惊不已。这一点是可以理解的，毕竟，在您与西奥多拉领主舰长大人之间的几代人之间，所有能证明您血缘关系的证据都消失了。夫人的仆人们花了很大力气才找到了您，证实了您的血缘关系。如今，您已经是这个王朝的其中一位继承人了。”

languages.text: «Saludos, {name}...». {n}Voigtvir te examina de arriba abajo con una sonrisa delgada.{/n} «O, debería decir, {name} von Valancius, hereder{mf|o|a} de la bendita casa de Comerciantes Independientes al servicio del {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Tal vez esta relación l{mf|e|a} sorprenda. Es comprensible, dado que las pruebas de su relación sanguínea con la Lord Capitán Theodora se perdieron en las generaciones que les separan. Los sirvientes de milady trabajaron con todo su empeño para descubrir y verificar este lazo familiar que ahora l{mf|e|a} convierte en un{mf|o|a} de los herederos de la dinastía».
languages.original_text: "My regards, {name}..." {n}Voigtvir looks you up and down with a thin smile.{/n} "Or should I say, {name} von Valancius, scion of a blessed Rogue Trader house in the service of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}? Perhaps this kinship came as a shock to you. Understandably so, given that all evidence of the connection was lost in the generations separating you and Lord Captain Theodora. It required no small effort on the part of Her Ladyship's servants to discover and verify this blood tie, which has now made you one of the heirs of this dynasty."

traits.locale_text: «Saludos, {name}...». {n}Voigtvir te examina de arriba abajo con una sonrisa delgada.{/n} «O, debería decir, {name} von Valancius, hereder{mf|o|a} de la bendita casa de Comerciantes Independientes al servicio del {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Tal vez esta relación l{mf|e|a} sorprenda. Es comprensible, dado que las pruebas de su relación sanguínea con la Lord Capitán Theodora se perdieron en las generaciones que les separan. Los sirvientes de milady trabajaron con todo su empeño para descubrir y verificar este lazo familiar que ahora l{mf|e|a} convierte en un{mf|o|a} de los herederos de la dinastía».

languages.text: 「よろしくお願いします、{name}さん…」{n}ボイトヴィルはうすら笑いを浮かべながらあなたを上から下まで舐めまわすように見る。{/n}「それとも、{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}に仕えている祝福された自由開拓者一家の子孫、{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウスと言えば良かったでしょう？おそらくこの血縁はあなたにとってショックだったでしょう。あなたとロード・キャプテン・シオドーラ様を隔てる世代間のつながりの証拠がすべて失われたことを考えると、当然のことです。この血のつながりを発見し、証明するために、シオドーラ様の使用人たちには少なからぬ努力が必要でした。これによって、あなたはこの王朝の後継者の一人となったのです」
languages.original_text: "My regards, {name}..." {n}Voigtvir looks you up and down with a thin smile.{/n} "Or should I say, {name} von Valancius, scion of a blessed Rogue Trader house in the service of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}? Perhaps this kinship came as a shock to you. Understandably so, given that all evidence of the connection was lost in the generations separating you and Lord Captain Theodora. It required no small effort on the part of Her Ladyship's servants to discover and verify this blood tie, which has now made you one of the heirs of this dynasty."

traits.locale_text: 「よろしくお願いします{name}…」 {n}ボイドヴィルはうすら笑いを浮かべながらあなたを上から下まで舐めまわすように見る。{/n}「または、こういった方がいいかもしれません。{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}に仕えている恵まれた自由開拓者一家の子孫、{name}フォン・ヴァランシウス。おそらくこの血縁はあなたにとってショックだったでしょう。あなたとロード・キャプテン・テオドラを隔てる世代間のつながりの証拠がすべて失われたことを考えると、当然のことです。この血のつながりを発見し、証明するために、レディ・テオドラの使用人たちには少なからぬ努力が必要でした。この血のつながりによって、あなたはこの王朝の後継者の一人となったのです」

「よろしくお願いします、{name}さん…」{n}ボイトヴィルはうすら笑いを浮かべながらあなたを上から下まで舐めまわすように見る。{/n}「それとも、{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}に仕えている祝福された自由開拓者一家の子孫、{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウスと言えば良かったでしょう？おそらくこの血縁はあなたにとってショックだったでしょう。あなたとロード・キャプテン・シオドーラ様を隔てる世代間のつながりの証拠がすべて失われたことを考えると、当然のことです。この血のつながりを発見し、証明するために、シオドーラ様の使用人たちには少なからぬ努力が必要でした。これによって、あなたはこの王朝の後継者の一人となったのです」

languages.original_text: "My regards, ..." {n}Voigtvir looks you up and down with a thin smile.{/n} "Or should I say,  von Valancius, scion of a blessed Rogue Trader house in the service of the Imperium? Perhaps this kinship came as a shock to you. Understandably so, given that all evidence of the connection was lost in the generations separating you and Lord Captain Theodora. It required no small effort on the part of Her Ladyship's servants to discover and verify this blood tie, which has now made you one of the heirs of this dynasty."

languages.text: {n}Voigtvir vous détaille des pieds à la tête, un léger sourire aux lèvres.{/n} « Mes hommages, {name}... Ou devrais-je dire, {name} von Valancius, {mf|descendant|descendante} d'une noble maison de libres-marchands au service de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} ? Ce lien de parenté vous a peut-être {mf|surpris|surprise}. C'est compréhensible, lorsqu'on sait que toute preuve de ce lien a été perdue au fil des générations vous séparant de la seigneure-capitaine Théodora. Les serviteurs de Sa Seigneurie n'ont pas ménagé leur peine pour découvrir et vérifier cette descendance par le sang qui fait aujourd'hui de vous l'{mf|un des héritiers|une des héritières} de cette dynastie. »
languages.original_text: "My regards, {name}..." {n}Voigtvir looks you up and down with a thin smile.{/n} "Or should I say, {name} von Valancius, scion of a blessed Rogue Trader house in the service of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}? Perhaps this kinship came as a shock to you. Understandably so, given that all evidence of the connection was lost in the generations separating you and Lord Captain Theodora. It required no small effort on the part of Her Ladyship's servants to discover and verify this blood tie, which has now made you one of the heirs of this dynasty."

traits.locale_text: {n}Voigtvir vous détaille des pieds à la tête, un léger sourire aux lèvres.{/n} « Mes hommages, {name}... Ou devrais-je dire, {name} von Valancius, {mf|descendant|descendante} d'une noble maison de libres-marchands au service de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} ? Ce lien de parenté vous a peut-être {mf|surpris|surprise}. C'est compréhensible, lorsqu'on sait que toute preuve de ce lien a été perdue au fil des générations vous séparant de la seigneure-capitaine Théodora. Les serviteurs de Sa Seigneurie n'ont pas ménagé leur peine pour découvrir et vérifier cette descendance par le sang qui fait aujourd'hui de vous l'{mf|un des héritiers|une des héritières} de cette dynastie. »

languages.text: "Sehr erfreut, {name} ..." {n}Voigtvir mustert dich ausgiebig mit einem schmalen Lächeln.{/n} "Oder sollte ich {name} von Valancius sagen, {mf|Nachfahre|Nachfahrin} eines gesegneten Freihändlerhauses in Diensten des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g}? Die Verwandtschaft war möglicherweise ein Schock für Euch. Verständlicherweise, gingen doch alle Beweise der Verbindung in den Generationen verloren, die Euch und Lord Captain Theodora trennen. Es war keine geringe Mühe für die Diener Ihrer Ladyschaft, diese Blutsbande zu entdecken und zu überprüfen, die Euch nun zu einem der Erben dieser Dynastie gemacht hat."
languages.original_text: "My regards, {name}..." {n}Voigtvir looks you up and down with a thin smile.{/n} "Or should I say, {name} von Valancius, scion of a blessed Rogue Trader house in the service of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}? Perhaps this kinship came as a shock to you. Understandably so, given that all evidence of the connection was lost in the generations separating you and Lord Captain Theodora. It required no small effort on the part of Her Ladyship's servants to discover and verify this blood tie, which has now made you one of the heirs of this dynasty."

traits.locale_text: "Sehr erfreut, {name} ..." {n}Voigtvir mustert dich ausgiebig mit einem schmalen Lächeln.{/n} "Oder sollte ich {name} von Valancius sagen, {mf|Nachfahre|Nachfahrin} eines gesegneten Freihändlerhauses in Diensten des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g}? Die Verwandtschaft war möglicherweise ein Schock für Euch. Verständlicherweise, gingen doch alle Beweise der Verbindung in den Generationen verloren, die Euch und Lord Captain Theodora trennen. Es war keine geringe Mühe für die Diener Ihrer Ladyschaft, diese Blutsbande zu entdecken und zu überprüfen, die Euch nun zu einem der Erben dieser Dynastie gemacht hat."

languages.text: "Saygılarımı sunarım {name}..." {n}Voigtvir, seni hafif bir gülümsemeyle baştan aşağı süzüyor.{/n} "Yoksa {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk'un{/g} hizmetindeki kutsanmış bir Hür Tacir hanesinin evladı olan {name} von Valancius mu demeliyim? Belki bu akrabalık sizin için şoke edici olmuştur. Aradaki bağın tüm kanıtlarının sizle Lord Kaptan Theodora'yı ayıran nesiller boyunca kaybolup gittiği düşünülürse anlaşılır bir durum. Sizi bu hanedanlığın vârislerinden biri yapan bu kan bağını ortaya çıkarıp doğrulamak için Leydi Hazretleri'nin hizmetkârları azımsanamayacak çaba sarf etti."
languages.original_text: "My regards, {name}..." {n}Voigtvir looks you up and down with a thin smile.{/n} "Or should I say, {name} von Valancius, scion of a blessed Rogue Trader house in the service of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}? Perhaps this kinship came as a shock to you. Understandably so, given that all evidence of the connection was lost in the generations separating you and Lord Captain Theodora. It required no small effort on the part of Her Ladyship's servants to discover and verify this blood tie, which has now made you one of the heirs of this dynasty."

Belki bu akrabalık sizin için şoke edici olmuştur. Aradaki bağın tüm kanıtlarının sizle Lord Kaptan Theodora'yı ayıran nesiller boyunca kaybolup gittiği düşünülürse anlaşılır bir durum. Sizi bu hanedanlığın vârislerinden biri yapan bu kan bağını ortaya çıkarıp doğrulamak için Leydi Hazretleri'nin hizmetkârları azımsanamayacak çaba sarf etti."
